extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.4.6 - Jan. 22, 2022[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Trakt status indicators and watched/unwatched show counts are now part of the [B]"traktsync.db"[/B] and run with the existing background sync service. This significantly speeds up menu load times. Clearing cache will no longer wipe out this data. If user needs this data rebuild please use the [B]"Tools - Trakt Management Tools - Force Trakt Sync to local database"[[/B] function.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Due to the significant speed increase of watched/unwatched counts from above the setting to disable counts has been removed. The setting to add counts to multi episode lists remains.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] All show and season level counts now only consider aired episodes in the count collection process.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] A new setting has been added to the "General" category to allow changing the "Certification Country (MPAA)" used. You can also add a prefix to the certification if desired.[/I]
